title: WTB: EPDG cards. Need some help.
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: WTB: EPDG cards. Need some help.
posts.post_content:
Willing to pay top dollar for these EPDGs in almost any condition......

Congalton 
Hummel
Tinker bat off
Young with glove

And of course either of the cobbs, but would need these to be lower grade (graded 2.5 or lower)

I’m really close to finishing this subset and could really use the help.

Even if you aren’t selling, let me see them if you got them!!!!  Or if you are only wanting to trade them, let me know.  I’ll find ways.....

Thanks for looking!
Jeff
still looking.....anyone have Congalton, Hummel, Tinker bat off or Young with glove?

Still looking if anyone can help me out!!!! 


[url=https://flic.kr/p/2iZsJte][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/49877013651_9680d0e990_b.jpg[/img][/url]

I checked mine but no luck. The few I did have that you needed, you must have picked up on you last purchases such as Keeler with Bat. Which is great because I wasn't ready to part with my PSA 4. I still can't believe I only paid $357 four years ago for it. And I remember at the time not feeling comfortable paying that much because I really didn't need a PSA 4 grade to keep me happy. Crazy how much things change in just 4 years.
